publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3227 Mr Andy Kerr: Local Government in Scotland Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Local Government in Scotland Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

Supported by: Peter Peacock
